channel.title: 1 error. please help
channel.description:
Sorry if i sound like a noob or whatever you guys call it..
Please help me fix this!
[code] client.java:26124 illegal start of expression public boolean ApplyDeadz<> {
1 error Press any key to continue . . . ^[/code]
EDIT:and there is a little arrow pointing up at the p in public boolean.

item.title: 1 error. please help
item.dc:creator: @Aff Aff
item.description:
@Aff wrote:

[code]}
public boolean ApplyDeadz() {

	if (IsDeadTimer == false) {
		actionTimer = 0;
		ResetAttack();
		ResetAttackNPC();
		setAnimation(0x900);
                    IsDeadTeleporting = true;
		IsDeadTimer = true;
                    ApplyDead();
	}
	if (actionTimer == 0 && IsDeadTimer == true) {

                    PKz();

                    CheckDrop();

                    ApplyRingz();

                    NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
                    setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]), playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
                    playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
                    refreshSkills();
                    PoisonDelay = 9999999;
                    KillerId = playerId;
                    if(keepItem != 0)
                    addItem(keepItem, keepItemAmount);
                    if(keepItem2 != 0)
                    addItem(keepItem2, keepItemAmount2);
                    if(keepItem3 != 0)
                    addItem(keepItem3, keepItemAmount3);

                    resetKeepItem();

	}
	return true;
}

public int keepItem = 0;
public int keepItem2 = 0;
public int keepItem3 = 0;
public int keepItemAmount = 0;
public int keepItemAmount2 = 0;
public int keepItemAmount3 = 0;

public void resetKeepItem() {
keepItem = 0;
keepItem2 = 0;
keepItem3 = 0;
keepItemAmount = 0;
keepItemAmount2 = 0;
keepItemAmount3 = 0;
}

public void keepItem1() {
for(int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++) {
int highest = 0;
int value = (int)Math.floor(GetItemShopValue(playerItems[i]-1, 0, i));
if(value > highest && playerItems[i]-1 != -1) {
highest = value;
keepItem = playerItems[i]-1;
keepItemAmount = playerItemsN[i];
}
}
}

public void keepItem2() {
for(int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++) {
int highest = 0;
int value = (int)Math.floor(GetItemShopValue(playerItems[i]-1, 0, i));
if(value > highest && playerItems[i]-1 != keepItem && playerItems[i]-1 != -1) {
highest = value;
keepItem2 = playerItems[i]-1;
keepItemAmount2 = playerItemsN[i];
}
}
}

public void keepItem3() {
for(int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++) {
int highest = 0;
int value = (int)Math.floor(GetItemShopValue(playerItems[i]-1, 0, i));
if(value > highest && playerItems[i]-1 != keepItem && playerItems[i]-1 != keepItem2 && playerItems[i]-1 != -1) {
highest = value;
keepItem3 = playerItems[i]-1;
keepItemAmount3 = playerItemsN[i];
}
}
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: 1 error. please help
item.dc:creator: @Andyyy Andyyy
item.description:
@Andyyy wrote:

Okay aff would you please show me what it should look like??
Heres my code::

[code]
public boolean ApplyDeadz() {

	if (IsDeadTimer == false) {
		actionTimer = 0;
		ResetAttack();
		ResetAttackNPC();
		setAnimation(0x900);
                    IsDeadTeleporting = true;
		IsDeadTimer = true;
                    ApplyDead();
	}
	if (actionTimer == 0 && IsDeadTimer == true) {

                    PKz();

                    CheckDrop();

                    ApplyRingz();

                    NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
                    setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]), playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
                    playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
                    refreshSkills();
                    PoisonDelay = 9999999;
                    KillerId = playerId;
                    if(keepItem != 0)
                    addItem(keepItem, keepItemAmount);
                    if(keepItem2 != 0)
                    addItem(keepItem2, keepItemAmount2);
                    if(keepItem3 != 0)
                    addItem(keepItem3, keepItemAmount3);

                    resetKeepItem();

	}
	return true;
}

public int keepItem = 0;
public int keepItem2 = 0;
public int keepItem3 = 0;
public int keepItemAmount = 0;
public int keepItemAmount2 = 0;
public int keepItemAmount3 = 0;

public void resetKeepItem() {
keepItem = 0;
keepItem2 = 0;
keepItem3 = 0;
keepItemAmount = 0;
keepItemAmount2 = 0;
keepItemAmount3 = 0;
}

public void keepItem1() {
for(int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++) {
int highest = 0;
int value = (int)Math.floor(GetItemShopValue(playerItems[i]-1, 0, i));
if(value > highest && playerItems[i]-1 != -1) {
highest = value;
keepItem = playerItems[i]-1;
keepItemAmount = playerItemsN[i];
}
}
}

public void keepItem2() {
for(int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++) {
int highest = 0;
int value = (int)Math.floor(GetItemShopValue(playerItems[i]-1, 0, i));
if(value > highest && playerItems[i]-1 != keepItem && playerItems[i]-1 != -1) {
highest = value;
keepItem2 = playerItems[i]-1;
keepItemAmount2 = playerItemsN[i];
}
}
}

public void keepItem3() {
for(int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++) {
int highest = 0;
int value = (int)Math.floor(GetItemShopValue(playerItems[i]-1, 0, i));
if(value > highest && playerItems[i]-1 != keepItem && playerItems[i]-1 != keepItem2 && playerItems[i]-1 != -1) {
highest = value;
keepItem3 = playerItems[i]-1;
keepItemAmount3 = playerItemsN[i];
}
}
}[/code]
